mapper.select: SELECT product_no as productNo , state_cd as stateCd , (SELECT state_nm FROM state WHERE state_cd = p.state_cd) as stateNm , category_no as categoryNo , (SELECT category_nm FROM category WHERE category_no = p.category_no) as categoryNm , title as title , content as content , price as price , reg_emp_no as regEmpNo , reg_dtt as regDtt , bump_dtt as bumpDtt , view_cnt as viewCnt , like_cnt as likeCnt FROM product p WHERE use_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY p.bump_dtt DESC

SELECT product_no as productNo , state_cd as stateCd , (SELECT state_nm FROM state WHERE state_cd = p.state_cd) as stateNm , category_no as categoryNo , (SELECT category_nm FROM category WHERE category_no = p.category_no) as categoryNm , title as title , content as content , price as price , reg_emp_no as regEmpNo , (SELECT emp_nm FROM emp WHERE emp_no = p.reg_emp_no) as regEmpNm , ( SELECT d.dept_nm FROM emp e INNER JOIN dept d ON e.dept_cd = d.dept_cd WHERE e.emp_no = reg_emp_no) as regDeptNm , reg_dtt as regDtt , bump_dtt as bumpDtt , view_cnt as viewCnt , like_cnt as likeCnt FROM product p WHERE use_yn = 'Y' AND product_no = #{productNo}
SELECT category_no as categoryNo , category_nm as categoryNm FROM category c WHERE c.use_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY category_no ASC
SELECT state_cd as stateCd , state_nm as stateNm FROM state s WHERE s.use_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY state_cd ASC

SELECT product_no as productNo , state_cd as stateCd , (SELECT state_nm FROM state WHERE state_cd = p.state_cd) as stateNm , category_no as categoryNo , (SELECT category_nm FROM category WHERE category_no = p.category_no) as categoryNm , title as title , content as content , price as price , reg_emp_no as regEmpNo , reg_dtt as regDtt , bump_dtt as bumpDtt , view_cnt as viewCnt , like_cnt as likeCnt FROM product p WHERE use_yn = 'Y' AND reg_emp_no = #{empNo} AND state_cd = #{stateCd} ORDER BY p.bump_dtt DESC
